article.headline: Utah Valley State 64, Southern Utah 55
article.story: OREM, Utah (AP) -- David Heck scored 20 points to lead Utah Valley State to a 64-55 win over Southern Utah on Friday night. The Wolverines (7-5) enjoyed a double-digit lead for most of the second half, but the Thunderbirds (8-5) scored eight straight to pull within 55-49 with five minutes left. But Heck quelled the rally and sapped SUU of its momentum when he made a 3-pointer with 3:57 to go. The T-Birds didn't score again until just over a minute remained in the game and never posed a serious threat the rest of the way. UVSC built a 22-9 lead in the first half when Southern Utah began the game shooting 2-for-14 from the field. A 3-pointer by Wolverine forward Richard Troyer in the waning moments of the first half gave Utah Valley a 32-17 halftime advantage and its largest lead of the game. Senior guard Steve Barnes led the T-Birds with 16 points and Brad Kanis came off the bench to collect 12 rebounds and block 10 shots for SUU. Troyer added 11 points for the Wolverines, including three 3-pointers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
